entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Very clear - the CDC expect Coronavirus to be still around in the Fall/Winter. Trump wants everyone to think that he will destroy it. Just insane. He won’t and just ignores the best advice. Americans should wake up to the reality that this thing will be around for some time.
